author: Special Correspondent
text:
TMC leader G.K. Vasan on Monday said that he has been holding talks with a few friendly parties to forge an alliance to contest the State elections.

“I am maintaining cordial relationship with leaders of various parties. I am holding talks with a few of them,” he told reporters in Ariyalur.

“Why not,” he asked when asked whether the AIADMK was one among them.

Mr. Vasan said that his party would forge an alliance, acceptable not only to cadre but also to the people, very soon.
title: TMC in touch with friendly parties: Vasan
